title: Game-Based Online Flipped Learning Design for Enhancing Degree Apprentice Competencies

context.additional_context: Learners often require immediately applicable practical knowledge in the workplace and have limited formal education experience; a blended learning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD) is necessary

learning_goals: Learners can apply real-world job problem-solving strategies with at least 80% engagement through a work simulation game
By completing at least 70% of the pre-class online flipped learning content (videos/quizzes), learners can actively participate in discussions and hands-on activities during offline classes.
Through reflective practice journaling, learners can derive three concrete examples of applying learned content to their personal work tasks.

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Supported App

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
